name: Dice N' Roll
description:
-Build sushi by placing nori first on the rolling mat

-Then add rice to the roll -Look at the ticket to determine which ingredients to add

-Grab your ingredient, place it on the cutting board to dice.

-Take diced ingredients and add to your sushi roll

-When the roll is complete, grab the roll to roll it up!

-Place the roll on the plate, then ring the bell!

-Arrow keys to move the selected item

-Spacebar to grab or place a grabbed item

-TIP: Add diced ingredients in the order they show on the ticket! The top item should always be added first!

------------------------------------------------------

A short game by Ben Fulcher and Bradley Elliott about dicing veggies and rolling sushi during the lunch rush.

We made* this in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2022 (Theme: Roll of the Dice). It's unfinished and rough around the edges, but we hope you enjoy it!

Thanks for playing!

-Bradley & Ben


* All audio in the game is from https://opengameart.org

** Linux and Mac builds are untested
